item.title: Video Creator for Unboxing and Wearing Loafer Shoes for Tik-Tok, Instagram Reel or Youtube Short - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator who can produce short form video for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube shorts. The videos will focus on unboxing and showcasing a Penny loafer shoe being worn on the feet. The videos should be creative, engaging, and visually appealing to catch the attention of our target audience.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Creative storytelling
    - Knowledge of TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube trends
    - Familiarity with loafer shoes fashion

    This is a small project that can be completed under 1 month. We are looking for someone with an intermediate level of expertise in video creation and social media marketing. If you have a passion for fashion, creativity, and are skilled in producing engaging short videos, we would love to hear from you!


Reference Video: https://www.tiktok.com/@devanondeck/video/7343281125906763051

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram
Skills: Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: SHORT turnaround. Edit Articulate Storyline 360 eLearning, w/ edit a video w/ Ken Burns effects - Upwork
item.description:
We need a draft storyline project edited by Thurs June 27  at 8AM pacific time (US).  Bonus $50 for completing with high quality by Wednesday at 2:00pm pacific. Current version here: https://360.articulate.com/review/content/5e58aae2-960b-462d-bd00-1851bf53b92b/review. The client wants text changes and provided those in a table, which is attached. We use stock video, and are trying to figure out a way to pause/use Ken Burn effects so the video and narration have the same timing. Client mentions "circling" the person talking but we are looking for something better and think Ken Burns effects could be powerful if timed to the script/narration. We will provide assets and storyline file. If interested, respond with your price.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Articulate Storyline
Skills: Video Editing, Articulate Storyline
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
At Be Fit Studio, we are dedicated to providing a motivating and supportive environment for our clients to achieve their fitness goals. Our state-of-the-art facilities, professional trainers, and dynamic workout programs are designed to help individuals of all fitness levels reach their full potential.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media Content Creator to create one month's worth of content. The primary goal of this position is to develop and execute a comprehensive social media content plan aimed at attracting new clients to our gym within the next 30 days.

Responsibilities:
- Develop a strategic social media content calendar for the month.
- Create engaging and visually appealing content for various social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, etc.).
- Highlight gym facilities, classes, trainers, client success stories, and special promotions.
- Design and produce high-quality images, videos, graphics, and written content.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Social Media Content Creator, preferably in the fitness industry.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and best practices.
- Excellent visual and written communication skills.
- Proficiency in graphic design and video editing software.
- Creative mindset with the ability to generate unique and engaging content ideas.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Passion for fitness and a healthy lifestyle is a plus.

Application Process:
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining their relevant experience and creative ideas.

Join us in our mission to inspire and motivate individuals to lead healthier, more active lives! We look forward to seeing your creative ideas and working together to attract more clients to Be Fit Studio.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:38 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Travel Clips - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to put together our travel clips and create a short video. The video should be similar in style to the popular Pani Bottle Youtuber videos, with the addition of subtitles. The final product should be visually appealing, engaging, and tell a compelling story of our travel experiences.

Responsibilities:
- Review and organize raw footage
- Trim footage to remove unnecessary parts
- Add subtitles in (in korean and in english) to enhance the storytelling
- Edit and enhance video quality
- Add background music and sound effects

Skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong attention to detail and storytelling abilities
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

We are seeking an intermediate-level video editor who can bring creativity and technical expertise to our travel video.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Freelance TikTok and Instagram Video Editor for Travel-Related Content - Upwork
item.description:
👉Tailbox.com is searching for AN ELITE video editor of short video content.

👉Serious potential for long-term work.

We're looking for a skilled freelance video editor with experience in editing TikTok and Instagram videos for travel-related content. The ideal candidate will have a strong creative eye and be able to create visually engaging videos that our target audience will love. As a video editor, your job will be to select and sequence footage, add music and effects, and create high-quality videos that fit our brand.

Responsibilities:
- Edit TikTok and Instagram videos to make them look great and tell a story.
- Add music, effects, and transitions to make the videos engaging.
- Make sure the videos meet the specifications for each platform.
- Work with our team to understand our brand's vision and target audience.
- Keep up with social media trends and best practices for video editing.

Required Skills:
- Know how to use video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
- Have a good understanding of TikTok and Instagram video formats and trends.
- Be able to work quickly and produce high-quality videos.
- Pay attention to detail and be organized.
- Have a creative mindset and be able to think outside the box.

This is a medium-sized project that will last 1 to 3 months, with the possibility of extension depending on how well you perform and the project's needs. We're looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can bring our travel-related content to life on TikTok and Instagram.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor Specialist Needed ASAP! - Upwork
item.description:
Actively looking for a video editor to help edit long-form YouTube videos (5-10 min).

[Who we are & What we do]

We are CreativeClip Studios, an end-to-end YouTube production company helping software businesses upload more content on YouTube to grow their presence and sales.

[Job Role]

- Edit 2-4 videos per week
- Use Frame.io to gather client feedback on your edits
- Make revisions to videos

[Video style]

Check out the following YouTube channels to see the editing style we're looking for:

- Lemlist
- Masters in Marketing
- Instantly

[Requirements]

- YouTube video editing experience (Long-form)
- High-level of English writing to write video captions with little to no errors
- Motion graphic design experience for video animations
- Fast turnaround times (1-2 days)
- Can work in a fast-paced and competitive environment
- Unlimited revisions
- Freelancer (NO AGENCIES)

[Compensation]

We pay per video and reward the best editors on our team with more work so they can make more money.

Pay per video = $50 to $100 per video

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:12 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Manager, Strategist, & Marketer for Etsy Consultant - Upwork
item.description:
OptiShop Solutions is a leading Etsy shop optimization specialist firm dedicated to transforming Etsy shops into high-performing, revenue-generating businesses. We are now expanding our digital presence and looking to leverage YouTube as a powerful marketing tool. We seek a talented and experienced YouTube Marketer/Strategist to join our team and help us create and execute a comprehensive YouTube strategy.

Job Description:
As a YouTube Marketer/Strategist at OptiShop Solutions, you will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to grow our YouTube channel, enhance our brand presence, and drive engagement and conversions. You will handle everything from content ideation and SEO to thumbnail creation and video posting. Your ultimate goal is to create captivating and profitable content that resonates with our target audience.

Responsibilities:
Develop and execute a comprehensive YouTube marketing strategy to grow our channel and increase engagement.
Conduct in-depth research to identify profitable content ideas and trends relevant to our niche.
Create enticing and SEO-optimized titles, descriptions, and tags for each video to maximize visibility and search rankings.
Design eye-catching and clickable thumbnails that attract viewers.
Manage the entire video posting process, including scheduling, optimizing metadata, and monitoring performance.
Analyze video performance data and make data-driven recommendations to improve future content and strategy.
Engage with our audience through comments and community posts to build a loyal and active subscriber base.
Provide a quote for potential video editing services, although this may fall outside your primary responsibilities.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a YouTube Marketer/Strategist with a successful track record of growing YouTube channels.
Strong understanding of YouTube SEO, algorithms, and best practices.
Excellent copywriting skills with the ability to create compelling and clickable titles and descriptions.
Proficiency in graphic design tools for thumbnail creation (e.g., Canva, Photoshop).
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.
Strong communication and organizational skills.
Creativity and a passion for creating engaging and valuable content.
Experience with video editing is a plus but not required.

What We Offer:
Remote work with flexible hours.
Opportunity to be part of a dynamic and growing team.
Competitive compensation based on experience and performance.
Potential for increased responsibilities and growth within the company.

How to Apply:
If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for YouTube marketing and a proven track record of driving results, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter, and examples of YouTube channels you have managed or contributed to.

Hourly Range: $14.00-$49.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development
Skills: YouTube, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content creator to join our team and help create engaging and informative content for our app designed to reduce stress, frustration with an innovative dinner solution.  Also to help simplify life organization for families. As a content creator, you will be responsible for creating video content, possibly researching and generating ideas for blog articles, social media posts, and in-app content that resonates with our target audience. Your content should be tailored to the needs of busy families.  Experience in family organization or related topics is a plus.

Skills required:
-Video content creation
-Video editing skills


This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months, starting as soon as possible. We are looking for an intermediate-level content creator who can deliver high-quality content on a consistent basis.

item.title: (Product) Photographers Wanted for Social Media Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there :)

We are a young start-up, a Mexican beverage brand specializing in healthy sodas with a functional twist of caffeine and tea bases.
For a re-launch campaign and also for ongoing content creations, we are looking for photographers, or passionated content creators (can also be UCG, or with smartphone) that can produce content mainly in the form of: photos, short videos, mashups...
and are able to quickly edit/cut them according towards our needs. As long as it is fitting our design language and brand personality/expectations we do not care if you do this highly professional with e.g. indesign, photoshop etc. or if you directly edit everything with your smartphone.

As we plan to launch our new product in approximately 1 month, we are seeking a passionate individual to help us reactivate our social media presence.

The ideal candidate will be able to handle various tasks independently, including
-content creation (professional pictures, videos..)
-content editing using common tools
-and being a skilled storyteller
-Additionally/Optionally, we are looking for someone who can also join events, festivals to create content directly on site (Normally, content production can take place at your place or in the city CDMX)
-ideally living in CDMX

While we understand that not all applicants will excel in every aspect listed, we appreciate honesty in identifying your strengths and areas you are comfortable covering.

Please note that we may also explore TikTok in the future.

We are a start-up and would ideally like to establish a long-term working relationship with someone who can grow with us and take on more responsibilities such as e.g. attending events on our behalf.

In terms of compensation, we are open to discussion and considering a monthly retainer with fixed set of content pieces (e.g. X pictures & Y videos per month).

We highly value results and will generously acknowledge your contribution if valuable outcomes are achieved.
ATTENTION: Current Budget is a placeholder amount

However, please understand that as a small start-up, we cannot immediately commit to a large budget without seeing tangible results. We have various costs and expenses that require careful allocation. Once we observe that your work/effort is bringing us valuable results, we will gladly invest more in that direction.

We look forward to getting to know you and potentially collaborating with you soon.
Please attach your website or CV on your reply.

Many thanks :)

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 23:59 UTC
Category: Product Photography
Skills:Food Photography, Social Media Content Creation, Photography, Product Photography, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Food Photography, Social Media Content Creation, Photography, Product Photography, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

Please attach your website or CV on your reply.

Many thanks :)

item.title: 1 MIN Video Edit - After Effects Motion Graphics - Upwork
item.description:
Project Brief: Explainer Video Project Update for Renewable Energy Company

Project Title: Wind Farm Development Update

Objective:
To create an engaging and informative 1-minute explainer video that provides a project update on the development of a wind farm. The video will communicate the progress, milestones, and future plans of the project to stakeholders and the public.

Project Scope:
- Duration: 1.20 MIN
- Format: Logo animations, dynamic text animations, still image transitions
- Software: Adobe After Effects

Assets Provided:
- Storyboard (attached)
- Images
- Fonts
- Artwork files
- Music

Tasks:
- Animate text, images, and artwork according to the storyboard.
- Incorporate provided music into the video.
- Ensure smooth transitions and a professional finish.

Design and Style:
- Clean and professional animation style.
- Consistent colour scheme and branding elements of the renewable energy company.
- Smooth transitions between text, animations, and still images.

Deliverables:
- Final animated video supplied as Adobe After Effects project file.

Timeline:
- First Draft: ASAP
- Revisions: ASAP
- Final Delivery: ASAP
- Budget: TBD

Additional Notes:
- Ensure all text is timed so as to be easy to read.
- Animations need to be dynamic but not distracting (not over the top)
- Maintain clear communication for feedback and approvals at each stage.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 23:49 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Explainer Video, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: Australia

item.title: Create a Spokesperson/Talking Head style video - Upwork
item.description:
We need to create a spokesperson video done in front of a green screen. The script is 466 words long and it requires you to speak naturally in the camera.

Looking for a speaker with an american accent.

Here is more information about the video: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1d2wsfiYw-eG8Zl0KjBLNq40SQIPCBuKFj_zOmHj9qoc/edit?usp=sharing

Requirements
- Spokesperson/talking head video made in front of green screen
- Speaker must be natural and expressive (not A.I or robotic)
- Speaker must have an american accent
- Speaker must wear a solid colour shirt (that will not clash with the greenscreen)
- Video must be recorded in good lighting conditions
- Video must be of good quality

Please type the word GREEN at the start of your proposal so I’m sure you have read this post.

Video Editing Position for Police Bodycam YouTube Channel

- Good standard in using Adobe Premiere Pro & After Effects

- Understanding video pacing and keeping things simple and effective

- Capable of creating a video from a voice and script with sourced clips linked

- Lifestyle videos

item.title: Éditeur de vidéos Tik Tok pour nos interviews micro-trottoirs - Upwork
item.description:
Nous recherchons un éditeur Videos avec bonne experience avec Tik Tok et IG Reels.

Tu as de l'experience avec de l'édition vidéos Tik Tok / Reels, tu as publié de nombreux contenus et tu consommes du contenu Tik Tok quotidiennement.

Nous interviewons les personnes dans la rue sur différents sujets d'actualité. Ton job sera de sélectionner les clips les plus interessants et engageants à partir des vidéos brutes que je t'envoie, régulièrement, pour en faire un montage dynamique et court.

Pour sélectionner les candidats, nous avons un petit test de découpage à partir de vidéos brutes. Celui qui fait le meilleur découpage de 30-45 secondes aura le job et sera récompensé $20 pour son travail.  Français requis. Merci !

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Category: Video Editing
